mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, memid, mememail, mempasswd, memname, memconfirm, memauth, membirth, memgender, memaddress, memphone, memsns, memintro, memphoto, memphoto_t, memsize, mbirthvb, mgendervb, maddressvb, mphonevb, msnsvb, mintrovb, mphotovb, memdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(memberno), 0)+1 as memberno FROM member), #{memid}, #{mememail}, #{mempasswd}, #{memname}, #{memconfirm}, #{memauth}, #{membirth}, #{memgender}, #{memaddress}, #{memphone}, #{memsns}, #{memintro}, #{memphoto}, #{memphoto_t}, #{memsize}, #{mbirthvb}, #{mgendervb}, #{maddressvb}, #{mphonevb}, #{msnsvb}, #{mintrovb}, #{mphotovb}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
SELECT memberno, memid, mememail, mempasswd, memname, memconfirm, memauth, membirth, memgender, memaddress, memphone, memsns, memintro, memphoto, memphoto_t, memsize, mbirthvb, mgendervb, maddressvb, mphonevb, msnsvb, mintrovb, mphotovb, memdate, r FROM ( SELECT memberno, memid, mememail, mempasswd, memname, memconfirm, memauth, membirth, memgender, memaddress, memphone, memsns, memintro, memphoto, memphoto_t, memsize, mbirthvb, mgendervb, maddressvb, mphonevb, msnsvb, mintrovb, mphotovb, memdate, rownum as r FROM( SELECT memberno, memid, mememail, mempasswd, memname, memconfirm, memauth, membirth, memgender, memaddress, memphone, memsns, memintro, memphoto, memphoto_t, memsize, mbirthvb, mgendervb, maddressvb, mphonevb, msnsvb, mintrovb, mphotovb, memdate FROM member
where memberno like '%' || #{word} || '%'
where memid like '%' || #{word} || '%'
where memname like '%' || #{word} || '%'
ORDER BY memberno DESC ) ) WHERE r >= #{startNum} AND r <= #{endNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) as cnt FROM member
where memberno like '%' || #{word} || '%'
where memid like '%' || #{word} || '%'
where memname like '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT memberno, memid, mememail, mempasswd, memname, memconfirm, memauth, membirth, memgender, memaddress, memphone, memsns, memintro, memphoto, memphoto_t, memsize, mbirthvb, mgendervb, maddressvb, mphonevb, msnsvb, mintrovb, mphotovb, memdate FROM member WHERE memberno = #{memberno}

SELECT memberno, memid, mememail, mempasswd, memname, memconfirm, memauth, membirth, memgender, memaddress, memphone, memsns, memintro, memphoto, memphoto_t, memsize, mbirthvb, mgendervb, maddressvb, mphonevb, msnsvb, mintrovb, mphotovb, memdate FROM member WHERE memid = #{memid}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mememail=#{mememail}, mempasswd=#{mempasswd}, memname=#{memname}, memconfirm=#{memconfirm}, memauth=#{memauth}, membirth=#{membirth}, memgender=#{memgender}, memaddress=#{memaddress}, memphone=#{memphone}, memsns=#{memsns}, memintro=#{memintro}, memphoto=#{memphoto}, memphoto_t=#{memphoto_t}, memsize=#{memsize}, mbirthvb=#{mbirthvb}, mgendervb=#{mgendervb}, maddressvb=#{maddressvb}, mphonevb=#{mphonevb}, msnsvb=#{msnsvb}, mintrovb=#{mintrovb}, mphotovb=#{mphotovb} where memberno =#{memberno}
